segments.text: Did you check the internet for next week's weather forecast ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I sure did . You're in luck ! It's supposed to snow all week in the mountains !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes ! Somebody up there loves me ! I knew it wasn't too late for snow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is kind of strange though , to have snow in April , and so much of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There have been so many dry winters lately that it's about time , don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you put it that way , I guess the skies can't hold out on us forever .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This will be the best ski trip I've ever taken . I can't wait to use my new hoard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will be the best as long as the weatherman is right .
segments.speaker: S2
